lyrics.stanza: "With one accord" within an upper room The faithful followers of Jesus met: One was the hope of every waiting soul, And on one object great each heart was set.
"With one accord," until the mighty gift Of pentecostal power was outpoured; Then forth as witnesses possessed of God, To preach the resurrection of the Lord!
"With one accord" within the house of God A hallelujah song is daily raised, As with the voice of one, from vocal hearts Christ Jesus' name is glorified and praised.
